messages.welcome:
Welcome to the Cloudflare Management Bot!
Use /list or /language to get started.
messages.access_denied: ❌ You do not have permission to use this bot.
messages.no_zone_selected: ❌ No zone is selected. Please use /list first.
messages.no_zone_selected_for_restore: ❌ No zone selected for restore. Please use /list and select a zone first.
messages.no_records_found: No records found in this zone.
messages.no_records_found_search: No records found matching your search.

messages.policy_field_updated: ✅ The '{field}' field has been updated successfully.
messages.confirm_delete_policy: ⚠️ Are you sure you want to delete the Rule '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
messages.policy_deleted_successfully: ✅ The Rule '{name}' has been deleted successfully.
messages.server_alert_notification: ⚠️ Server Alert ⚠️ Rule: {policy_name} IP: {ip} is unreachable. Monitoring... Automatic failover will trigger if it remains down.
messages.failover_notification_message: ⚠️ Automatic IP Failover Executed ⚠️ Rule: {policy_name} Server: {from_ip} became unreachable. Action: Switched relevant DNS records to backup IP {to_ip}.
messages.failover_notification_all_down: 🚨 Critical Alert: All Servers Are Down 🚨 Rule: {policy_name} Primary IP: {primary_ip} Backup IPs: {backup_ips} None of the configured servers are reachable. Please investigate immediately.
messages.server_recovered_notification: ✅ Server Recovered ✅ Rule: {policy_name} IP: {ip} is now back online. Note: If this is your primary IP and DNS is pointing to a backup, auto-failback will occur according to the schedule.
messages.failback_alert_notification: ✅ Primary Server Recovered ✅ Rule: {policy_name} IP: {primary_ip} is back online. Automatic failback to this IP is scheduled in {failback_minutes} minutes.
messages.invalid_ip: ❌ The IP address entered is not valid. Please try again.
messages.invalid_port: ❌ The port entered is not valid. Please enter a number between 1 and 65535.
messages.invalid_number: Please enter a valid positive number.
messages.invalid_number_range: Invalid format. Please enter a single number (e.g., 2) or a range (e.g., 1,3).
messages.failback_status_changed: Auto-Failback for Rule '{name}' has been set to {status}.
messages.admin_id_added: ✅ Admin with ID {admin_id} has been successfully added to the notification list.
messages.admin_id_already_exists: ⚠️ This admin ID is already in the list.
messages.admin_id_removed: ✅ Admin with ID {admin_id} has been successfully removed from the list.
messages.no_admins_to_remove: There are no admins in the notification list to remove.
messages.check_host_api_down_alert: ⚠️ Monitoring System Alert ⚠️ Could not connect to the Check-Host.net service. Monitoring and automatic failover are paused until the issue is resolved.
messages.fetching_locations_error: ❌ Could not fetch monitoring locations. Please try again later.
messages.select_country_message: Please select a country to view monitoring nodes:
messages.nodes_updated_message: ✅ {count} cities selected for monitoring {monitoring_type} IPs. Now, please answer this question: What is the minimum number of cities that must fail for the server to be considered "DOWN"? Enter a number between 1 and {count}. Recommendation: To avoid false positives, it's best to set this number to slightly more than half of your selected cities (e.g., for 5 cities, 3 is a good choice).
messages.threshold_updated_message: ✅ Threshold for {monitoring_type} IPs set to {threshold}. Settings saved.
messages.threshold_invalid_message: ❌ Invalid number. Please enter a positive integer (e.g., 1, 2).
messages.threshold_too_high_message: ❌ Threshold ({threshold}) cannot be greater than the number of selected nodes ({count}). Please enter a smaller number.
messages.session_expired_error: Error: Session expired. Please start over.

messages.error_no_zone_id: ❌ Error: Could not find zone ID.
messages.sync_started: ⏳ Manual health check and sync initiated...
messages.sync_step1: ⏳ Step 1/2: Running an immediate health check...
messages.sync_step2: ⏳ Step 2/2: Syncing DNS records with the latest status...
messages.sync_error: ❌ An error occurred during the sync process.
messages.invalid_id_numeric: ❌ Invalid ID. Please enter a numeric ID only.
messages.search_menu_command_message: To search, please first select a zone using the /list command, and then use the '🔎 Search' button.
messages.hybrid_mode_help_text: Tip: You can define both a Failover and a Load Balancing rule for the same records. In this 'Hybrid Mode', the Load Balancer manages the active IP, and the Failover rule acts as a final safety net if all Load Balancer IPs go down.
messages.invalid_weight_float: ❌ Invalid weight for IP {ip}. Weight must be a whole number (e.g., 1, 2, 5). Floats like 1.5 are not allowed.
messages.invalid_weight_positive: ❌ Invalid weight for IP {ip}. Weight must be a positive whole number (1 or greater).
messages.policy_records_updated: ✅ Record names for {policy_type} policy updated successfully!
messages.start_primary_monitoring_setup: ✅ Policy details saved. Now, let's configure monitoring for the Primary IP.
messages.start_backup_monitoring_setup: ✅ Primary IP monitoring saved. Now, let's configure monitoring for the Backup IPs.
